import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-category', templateUrl: './category.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category.component.scss'], }) export class CategoryComponent { public categories: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getCategories(); } public getCategories(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:7054/api/categories').subscribe( (response) => (this.categories = response), (error) => console.log(error) ); } }
